an3.50:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato mahacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekagarikampi karoti, paripanthepi titthati.
an3.50:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro visamanissito ca hoti, gahananissito ca hoti, balavanissito ca hoti.
an3.50:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro nadividuggam va nissito hoti pabbatavisamam va.
an3.50:1.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro tinagahanam va nissito hoti, rukkhagahanam va rodham va mahavanasandam va.
an3.50:2.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, mahacoro rajanam va rajamahamattanam va nissito hoti.
an3.50:3.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ime me rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhanissanti’ti.
an3.50:3.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tyassa rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhananti.
an3.50:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, mahacoro balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:3.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato mahacoro sandhimpi chindati, nillopampi harati, ekagarikampi karoti, paripanthepi titthati.
an3.50:4.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, tihi angehi samannagato papabhikkhu khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an3.50:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamanissito ca hoti gahananissito ca balavanissito ca.
an3.50:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamena kayakammena samannagato hoti, visamena vacikammena samannagato hoti, visamena manokammena samannagato hoti.
an3.50:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu visamanissito hoti.
an3.50:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu micchaditthiko hoti, antaggahikaya ditthiya samannagato hoti.
an3.50:6.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu gahananissito hoti.
an3.50:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu rajanam va rajamahamattanam va nissito hoti.
an3.50:7.4: ‘sace mam koci kinci vakkhati, ime me rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhanissanti’ti.
an3.50:7.5: Sace nam koci kinci aha, tyassa rajano va rajamahamatta va pariyodhaya attham bhananti.
an3.50:7.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, papabhikkhu balavanissito hoti.
an3.50:7.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato papabhikkhu khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati”ti.
